검색

SSAGE Workshop(2011-2017)

        Overview

        KWDI Workshop: Capacity Building for Women`s Policy

        Set and Share the Agenda for Gender Equality (SSAGE) Workshop (Annual Capacity Building Workshop for Policy Experts from Cambodia, Indonesia, Myanmar and Vietnam)

        Objectives

        • • To strengthen the capacity of gender policy experts in the Asia-Pacific region (Asia and the Pacific region)
        • • To enhance policymakers and gender experts’ sensitivity on gender equality and to expand their capacity to improve women’s policy.
        • • To establish a local policy network for women’s policy

        Key Features

        • • It is tailored to local needs based on the results of preliminary research and local consultation meetings on women’s policy.
        • • It mainly consists of core courses and elective courses by topic, and it is designed to make participants actively engaged in-depth discussions among themselves as well as with Korean experts in each field.
        • • It is participant-oriented/ interactive learning process

        Workshop Program

        • The Workshop program is tailored to local needs based on the results of preliminary research and local consultation meetings on women's policy. It mainly consists of core courses and elective courses by topic, and it is designed to make participants actively engaged in in-depth discussions among themselves and build close policy network for women's policy among themselves during the workshop so that they can put the plans in practice in their own countries.

        As a part of multi-year ODA research project titled “Strengthening Gender Equality Policy Infrastructure in
        the Asia-Pacific Region,” KWDI annually holds an annual week-long workshop titled Set and Share the
        Agenda for Gender Equality focusing on capacity building of the participants through lectures and field
        trips on gender issues.

        KWDI SSAGE Workshop Title, Duration and Venue, and Participants

        Year Title Duration & Venue Participants
        2011
        2011 KWDI SSAGE Workshop:
        Capacity Building for Women’s Policy of Cambodia and Indonesia
        		September 18- 30, 2011,
        KWDI, Seoul, Korea        		 27 participants in total (14 Cambodian participants and 13 Indonesian participants from Indonesia consisting of government officials and experts from civil society and academia)
        2012
        2012 KWDI SSAGE Workshop in Cambodia:
        Capacity Building for Gender Equality & Women’s Policy
        		May 8-11, 2012,
        Siem Reap, Cambodia         		32 participants from government, civil society and academia including Secretary of State from the Ministry of Women’s Affairs of Cambodia
        2012 KWDI SSAGE Workshop in Indonesia:
        Capacity Building for Gender Equality & Women’s Policy
        		May 29-June 1, 2012,
        Bali, Indonesia         		34 participants from government, civil society and academia
        2013
        2013 KWDI SSAGE Workshop:
        Capacity Building for Women’s Policy in Myanmar and Vietnam
        		September 9-13, 2013,
        KWDI, Seoul, Korea        		 28 participants in total (14 Myanmar participants and 14 Vietnamese participants consisting of government officials and experts from civil society, academia and international organizations)
        2014
        2014 KWDI SSAGE Workshop:
        Senior-Level Gender Policy Workshop and Dialogue
        		September 29 -October 3,
        2014, KWDI, Seoul, Korea         		25 senior-level officials in total (6 Cambodian participants; 7 Indonesian participants; 6 Myanmar participants; and 6 Vietnam participants from Parliament, Government, Governmental bodies, etc.)
        2015
        2015 KWDI SSAGE Workshop:
        trengthening Inter-Ministerial Gender Network
        		October 6-October 8, 2015,
        KWDI, Seoul, Korea         		18 government officials in total (5 Cambodian participants; 3 Indonesian participants; 5 Myanmar participants; and 5 Vietnamese participants from each country’s gender ministry and other line ministries)
        2016
        2016 KWDI SSAGE Workshop:
        Women’s Economic Empowerment and Human Rights
        		September 26-Octoer 1, 2016,
        KWDI, Seoul, Korea        		 23 participants in total (6 Cambodian participants; 5 Indonesian participants; 6 Myanmar participants; and 6 Vietnamese participants)
        2017
        2017 KWDI SSAGE Workshop:
        Empowerment of Girls and Young Women
        		September 4-9, 2017,
        KWDI, Seoul, Korea         		29 participants in total (8 Cambodian participants; 7 Indonesian participants; 7 Myanmar participants; and 7 Vietnamese participants)
